front.title: LISP Shared Extension Message & IANA Registry for LISP Packet Type Allocations

abstract.t: This document defines a registry for Locator/ID Separation Protocol (LISP) Packet Type allocations. It also specifies a LISP shared message type for defining future extensions and conducting experiments without consuming a LISP packet type codepoint for each extension. This document updates RFC6830 by defining a registry for LISP Packet Types assignments.
